data: TM AMB Fibrinogen Concentrate Once (Day of Treatment)
Order product as per site procedure. Consultation with Pathologist is available. Contact TM
Standard dose of fibrinogen is 4 g

Routine, Administer: 4 g, IV, Administer over: Refer to Fact Sheet/Product Monograph, once, Other - Specify in Indication Comments, Hypofibrinogenemia and prophylaxis for chemotherapy, Maximum rate 5 mL/min, T;N
Routine, Administer: 4 g, IV, Administer over: Refer to Fact Sheet/Product Monograph, once, Maximum rate 5 mL/min, T;N

If the patient exhibits signs or symptoms of a Transfusion Reaction, Print Transfusion Reaction Form from FormFast and follow your transfusion reaction guideline.  Notify provider of the transfusion reaction to obtain further care instructions.
